products.title: Hyperlock Spreader Bar Replacement
products.body_html:
Original part replacement for the Hyperlock spreader bar. Hyperlock is ensuring seamless and highly adjustable integration with Hyperlock ratchets, this configuration offers a completely new level of harness-to-rider interaction and on the fly precise harness tension adjustment.

Features

  • Wide surface area design.
  • Thumb screw ladder adjustment for optimized, perfect fit.
  • Thermoformed EVA spreader bar pad.
  • Easy aftermarket conversion to closed metal loop, sliding rope
    configuration or windsurf hook geometry.

featured_image.alt: Hyperlock Kiteboarding Harness Spreader Bar Replacement | Ride Engine
Hyperlock Kiteboarding Harness Spreader Bar Replacement | Ride Engine

products.title: Hyperlock Rope Conversion Kit
products.body_html:
Seeking absolute freedom? The Sliding Rope Conversion Kit for the Hyperlock system offers enhanced maneuverability, allowing smoother directional changes while riding waves. It enables riders to effortlessly engage in toe side riding and facilitates mastery in hydrofoiling. Equipped with a mini-loop connection, extended slider, and stainless-steel ring for increased durability, this kit ensures a seamless experience.

Sizing

  • Small: 8" Spreader Bars
    • Fits XS - S Hyperlock Harnesses
  • Large: 10" Spreader bars
    • Fits M-XL Hyperlock Harnesses

Features

  • 5mm Dyneema flying line cored rope.
  • 5mm Dyneema mini-loop.

Kit Includes

  • Rope slider
  • Mini loop
  • Stainless mounting bar

featured_image.alt: Hyperlock Spreader Bar Rope Conversion Kit | Ride Engine
Hyperlock Spreader Bar Rope Conversion Kit | Ride Engine

products.title: Hyperlock Closed Metal Loop Replacement
products.body_html:
For those seeking the utmost secure connection between the chicken loop and harness, the Hyperlock Closed Metal Loop is the answer. It eradicates any chance of false hooking or accidental unhooking. Made from durable 8mm steel and engineered with optimal geometry for all chicken loops, it’s easy to install and ensures reliable performance.

Features

  • 8mm stainless steel loop.
  • Pre-curved loop geometry.

products.title: Hyperlock Windsurf Metal Hook Replacement
products.body_html:
Harnesses equipped with the Ride Engine Hyperlock feature top-tier performance and comfort. With a simple transition to the Hyperlock Windsurf Metal Hook, tailored for windsurfing, you unlock the benefits of effortless entry and exit, along with the most intuitive and functional on-the-fly harness adjustment available.

Features

  • 8mm stainless steel hook.
  • Windsurf specific hook geometry.

products.title: Trad Spreader Fixed Kite Hook
products.body_html: This TRADitional-style spreader bar, designed to complement harnesses with webbing connections, integrates modern performance improvements. These enhancements include pre-curved stabilization wings that establish a direct link between the hook and harness. Additionally, it features the Mega Pad, a thermoformed EVA spreader pad for enhanced comfort. Moreover, it showcases the largest and most durable 8mm diameter stainless steel hook on the market, providing unmatched durability.

featured_image.alt: TRAD Spreader Bar Fixed Kite Hook for Kiteboarding Harness | Ride Engine
TRAD Spreader Bar Fixed Kite Hook for Kiteboarding Harness | Ride Engine

products.title: Trad Spreader Sliding Rope
products.body_html: While the initial users of rope spreader bars aimed to enhance their wave riding abilities by enabling more aggressive directional shifts and facilitating easier toe side riding, the advantages of a sliding rope have now extended to hydrofoilers striving to perfect new maneuvers, as well as freeriders who desire complete hook liberation and a secure connection, free from concerns about accidental unhooking or false hooks.

featured_image.alt: Trad Spreader Sliding Rope Kiteboarding Harness Spreader Bar | Ride Engine
Trad Spreader Sliding Rope Kiteboarding Harness Spreader Bar | Ride Engine

products.title: Trad Spreader Windsurf Hook
products.body_html: Leveraging all the high-performance attributes of the TRAD kite spreader, including the stabilization wings and thermoformed EVA Mega spreader pad, alongside the incorporation of a windsurf-specific geometry and an 8mm hook - the largest and most durable hook currently offered in the market.

featured_image.alt: Trad Spreader Windsurf Hook Windsurf Spreader Bar | Ride Engine
Trad Spreader Windsurf Hook Windsurf Spreader Bar | Ride Engine

products.title: Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar
products.body_html: A fixed hook offers the most direct connection to you and the kite, and now—when coupled with the innovative design of the Unity Spreader Bar—offers unparalleled feel and feedback. If you're reaching for the sky and chasing big air, a technical rider that loves unhooked tricks, or are looking for the most direct feel for freeriding and hydrofoiling, the Unity Kiteboard Spreader Bar is the key to unlocking your next level of performance. The Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar comes equipped with a large molded spreader-bar pad. Ideal for big air riders and people who love to push the limits of riding powered.

featured_image.alt: Ride Engine Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar - Spreader Bar
Ride Engine Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar - Spreader Bar
Ride Engine Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar - Spreader Bar
Ride Engine Unity Kite Mega Spreader Bar - Spreader Bar

products.title: Unity Mega Pad Conversion
products.body_html: Finding that you want to fly in comfort in your questfor the biggest air? Convert your Unity Spreader barto the Unity MEGA Spreader with this pad conversion.

products.title: Unity Sliding Rope Kit
products.body_html:
During the early underground-days of the kitesurfing movement, riders were looking for more freedom in movement to allow more aggressive directional changes and easier toe-side riding. Their solution? The rope spreader bar. Now freeriders and hydrofoiling fanatics have joined kitesurfers in hyping the virtues of the rope spreader bar. The Unity Rope Conversion Kit easily transforms your fixed kite hook to rope while retaining all the benefits of the Unity Spreader Bar.

Features:

  • Dual-rope system offers a full range of freedom that can be dialed into your preference of feel: setup as either full-sliding or with a mini-loop.
  • High-grade Dyneema® rope with flying-line core for added safety.
  • Stainless steel ring for friction-free movement.

products.title: Unity Kite Spreader Fixed Hook V1
products.body_html:
A fixed hook offers the most direct connection to you and the kite, and now—when coupled with the innovative design of the Unity Spreader Bar—offers unparalleled feel and feedback. If you're reaching for the sky and chasing big air, a technical rider that loves unhooked tricks, or are looking for the most direct feel for freeriding and hydrofoiling, the Unity Kiteboard Spreader Bar is the key to unlocking your next level of performance.

Features:

  • Quick, no-slip, “set it and forget" adjustment when used in conjunction with our revolutionary Unity Ladder-Lock Straps (available exclusively on the Elite Carbon and Saber harnesses).
  • TensionLock, a unique harness closure latch that levers the final bit of tension into the closure for a true locked-in fit.
  • High-strength composite material construction.
  • Ambidextrous user interface.
  • Minimalist padding creates a clean connection between spreader bar and harness.
  • High-grade stainless-steel hook.
  • Wide hook opening for seamless compatibility with all control bars.
  • Compatible for use on all 2021-2023 Ride Engine harnesses, as well as webbing-based harnesses.*

products.title: Unity Windsurf Spreader Fixed Hook V1
products.body_html:
Ride Engine harnesses offer a best-in-class fit with unrivaled comfort and performance, and with this classic windsurfing hook you can reap all these benefits, lengthening your time on the water. Optimized windsurf-specific hook angle and width allow for easy hooking and unhooking. The Unity Windsurf Spreader Bar is also a great option for wing-surf harness lines.

Features:

  • Quick, no-slip, “set it and forget" adjustment when used in conjunction with our revolutionary Unity Ladder-Lock Straps (available exclusively on the Elite Carbon and Saber harnesses).
  • TensionLock, a unique harness closure latch that levers the final bit of tension into the closure for a true locked-in fit.
  • High-strength composite material construction.
  • Ambidextrous user interface.
  • Minimalist padding creates a clean connection between spreader bar and harness.
  • High-grade stainless-steel hook.
  • Wide hook opening for seamless compatibility with all control bars.
  • Compatible for use on all 2021-2023 Ride Engine harnesses, as well as webbing-based harnesses.*

products.title: The Nug
products.body_html:
Simple, easy to use wingsurf harness line hook that is adaptable to any webbing waist leash or webbing slider harness.

Features:

  • Opening design that fits padded and non-padded webbing leashes.
  • Easy in, easy out hook geometry that freely slides on the harness line.
  • Fits up to 2" webbing.

products.title: Vinaka Wingsurf Hook Replacement
products.body_html: Replacement spreader bar hook for the Vinaka Harness.
